resources.string: I have read and agreed to the aforesaid content

1. The test program may have unforeseeable impact on your phone.\102. Some functions of the phone may not operate properly because third-party firmware, such as the photo-taking function of the camera.It may also cause device damage.\103. Personal and confidential information on the phone may be leaked, and security compromised.\104. The test program may modify some of the system functions, and prevent you from updating the system version to enjoy the latest service from ColorOS.\105. If you join the test program your phone will be in a state similar to factory default condition. We recommend that you perform a data backup prior to joining.\10\10
The aforesaid content does not cover risks that may come with the in-depth test, please exercise caution when selecting.
Please download the latest version from Realme Community to better experience this feature.
User quota for in-depth test has been used up
This is a government or corporate owned phone
Your OPPO ID is active for less than 60 days continuously
Network error. Please check the network and retry
The current app does not support your system, please update the system version.
You cannot apply again within 60 days
This phone model does not support in-depth test
Errors in the phone parameters found during verification
Are you sure you want to exit \10in-depth test?\10
No network connection. Please check \10the network settings and retry\10
You can only apply to exit in-depth test \10after carrying out bootloader lock operation in fastboot mode\10
The test program may have unforeseeable impact on your phone, please exercise caution when applying.
Application has been submitted, no re-submission is required

To apply for verification, the following conditions must be met:\101. The phone model must have been released in the market for more than 3 months.\102. No application records for the last 60 days.\103. Your OPPO ID must be older than 60 days at the time of signing in on your phone.\104. Number of users for in-depth test has not hit the maximum limit.\105. It must not be government or corporate owned, or a carrier-customized phone.
Tap here to change the account for application
